job.title: Director of Engineering, Autolist
job.description: stronguAbout AutolistbrbrustrongFor most people shopping for a vehicle is an experience wed rather forget Navigating a sea of endless options spending hours and the dealership and negotiating toetotoe with a dealer who does all this every day leaves automotive shoppers feeling exhausted and overwhelmed while hopeful but not sure they got a vehicle in good condition for a fair pricebrbrAutolist is on a mission to rewire the automotive industry by making it easier for everyone to find and get a vehicle they love We are creating an automotive shopping experience for every stage of the automotive life cycle  buying selling owning  and were well on our way As an independent brand and subsidiary of CarGurus NASDAQ CARG were a startup within the worldwide category leader in automotive shopping helping millions of monthly users via our awardwinning apps and web shopping platforms Our efforts to streamline the automotive shopping experience is supported by a strong passion to empower people with the knowledge and experience they need for everything automotive a dedication to equity inclusion and belonging and worldclass benefitsbrbrstronguWhat Youll DobrbrustrongAs the strongDirector of Engineering Managerstrong at Autolist you will provide managerial and technical leadership in a lean fastpaced datadriven environment You will be deeply engaged in the leadership of the company our culture product strategy technical strategy and more You will work alongside our engineers and managers to deliver great products and support the full development lifecycle discovering designing developing testing deploying maintaining observing and improving our softwarebrbrYou will own the success of our engineers in developing their careers as well as executing on products You will be handson and collaborative with fellow engineers analysts designers product and business partners as you solve exciting problems with real impact at scalebrbrThis role will report to the General Manager of Autolist and be a member of the Autolist Leadership TeambrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliManage a growing organization with 3 engineering managers and 15 engineersliliLead recruiting efforts to thoughtfully grow the teamliliMentor and motivate the engineering team contributing to the career development of othersliliLead the technical strategy and setting of standards technical vision and cultureliliSupport the teams to prioritize and scope engineering investmentsliliAssist in the delivery and maintenance of products write code perform code reviews and define best practicesliliEliminate roadblocks and make sure each team member has everything to achieve their full potentialliliActively drive the development of the Autolist cultureliliPartner with product business and design teams to implement disruptive consumer featuresliliTake an active role in the day to day operations of the engineering teamliliOwn goals deadlines and be a partner in companywide strategic planningliliKeep the team focused on the highestimpact tasks and projectsliliProvide an open and friendly line of communication for engineers to voice their success and concernsliliMake sure the engineers experience at Autolist is a positive oneliliServe as a link between engineering the executive team and HR to help the engineers be successfulliliInspire engineers to follow and refine best practicesbrliulstronguWhat Success Looks LikebrustrongulliSuccess of Engineering direct reportsliliTimely and impactful delivery of products and projectsliliAchievement of company goals and objectivesliliThe growth and career development of Autolist engineersliliCommunicating with General Manager engineering managers and other related executives and HR early and often about engineers successes and concernsliliDeveloper HappinessliliEnsuring our technology is built in a way that supports achieving our product and business goals in a timely manner without putting an impractical burden on future development effortsbrliulstronguWho You ArebrustrongulliResultsoriented proven technical leaderlili10 years of software development experiencelili4 years of management experiencelili2 years managing engineering managersliliExpertise with both dynamicinterpreted Javascript Ruby Python and compiled java kotlin languagesliliExperience with a modern Javascript framework like Nextjs React ReduxliliPolyglot engineer comfortable with full stack web developmentliliStrong understanding of Postgres or similar relational databasesliliStrong understanding of ElasticsearchliliExperience maintaining Cloud infrastructure AWS GCP or equivalent and familiarity with DevOps tools Terraform AWS CloudFormation AnsibleliliExpertise in maintaining Kubernetes clustersliliUnderstanding of how to build highperformance web applicationsliliAble to conceptualize develop test and release productliliDrawn to and thrive in a fastpaced environment that pushes highquality code continuouslyliliAble to work independently as well as collaborativelybrliulNote The requirements listed on this job description are guidelines not hard and fast rules To excel in this role you will not need to satisfy or meet every requirement listed If you have the transferable skills and want the opportunity to be considered  please applybrbrstrongBonusbrstrongulliHave worked in a pairprogramming environmentliliAn interest in exploring code design and architectureliliHave used testdriven development TDD extensivelyliliExperience building consumerfacing applicationsliliExperience of working with the auto industryliliPractical experience of a range of agile development methodologiesliliExperience building metasearch productsliliSecurity chops JWT HMAC CSP cryptographyliliPerformance chops CWV CRP PWA LnPliliAndroid andor iOS experienceliliMS or PhD in Computer Science or related fieldbrliulstrongEqual Opportunity StatementbrbrstrongAutolist is an equal opportunity employer We believe that everyone should receive equal consideration and treatment Recruitment hiring placements transfers and promotions will happen based on qualifications for the positions being filled regardless of sex gender identity race religious creed color national origin ancestry age physical disability pregnancy mental disability or medical conditionbrbrCheck out this link to learn more about our engineering team httpswwwautolistcomengineering
